name: pg-back-web
description: PgBackWeb is a web-based interface for managing PostgreSQL backups using pgBackRest. It allows scheduling, restoring, and managing backup operations through a modern self-hosted UI.

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Automate PostgreSQL backups with configurable schedules for full, incremental, and differential backups

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Manage all backup operations through a modern, responsive web UI without command-line access

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Track backup status, success rates, and storage usage with dashboard visualizations

features.title: Multiple Databases
features.description: Configure and manage backups for multiple PostgreSQL instances from a single interface

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Receive alerts when backups fail, complete, or require attention
